Uses of Package
com.vaadin.polymer.iron.element

  • Packages that use com.vaadin.polymer.iron.element 
    Package Description
    com.vaadin.polymer.iron.widget  
  • Classes in com.vaadin.polymer.iron.element used by com.vaadin.polymer.iron.widget 
    Class and Description
    IronA11yAnnouncerElement
    iron-a11y-announcer is a singleton element that is intended to add a11y
    to features that require on-demand announcement from screen readers.
    IronA11yKeysElement
    iron-a11y-keys provides a normalized interface for processing keyboard commands that pertain to WAI-ARIA best
    practices    .
    IronAjaxElement
    The iron-ajax element exposes network request functionality.
    IronAutogrowTextareaElement
    iron-autogrow-textarea is an element containing a textarea that grows in height as more
    lines of input are entered.
    IronCollapseElement
    iron-collapse creates a collapsible block of content.
    IronComponentPageElement
    Loads Polymer element and behavior documentation using
    Hydrolysis and renders a complete
    documentation page including demos (if available).
    IronDocPropertyElement
    Renders documentation describing a specific property of an element.
    IronDocViewerElement
    Renders documentation describing an element’s API.
    IronDropdownElement
    <iron-dropdown> is a generalized element that is useful when you have
    hidden content (.dropdown-content) that is revealed due to some change in
    state that should cause it to do so.
    IronFormElement
    `<iron-form> is an HTML <form> element that can validate and submit any custom
    elements that implement Polymer.IronFormElementBehavior, as well as any
    native HTML elements.
    IronIconElement
    The iron-icon element displays an icon.
    IronIconsetElement
    The iron-iconset element allows users to define their own icon sets.
    The src property specifies the url of the icon image.
    IronIconsetSvgElement
    The iron-iconset-svg element allows users to define their own icon sets
    that contain svg icons.
    IronImageElement
    iron-image is an element for displaying an image that provides useful sizing and
    preloading options not found on the standard <img> tag.
    IronInputElement
    <iron-input> adds two-way binding and custom validators using Polymer.IronValidatorBehavior
    to <input>.
    IronListElement
    iron-list displays a virtual, ‘infinite’ list.
    IronLocalstorageElement
    Element access to Web Storage API (window.localStorage).
    IronMediaQueryElement
    iron-media-query can be used to data bind to a CSS media query.
    The query property is a bare CSS media query.
    The query-matches property is a boolean representing whether the page matches that media query.
    IronMetaElement
    iron-meta is a generic element you can use for sharing information across the DOM tree.
    It uses monostate pattern such that any
    instance of iron-meta has access to the shared
    information.
    IronMetaQueryElement
    iron-meta is a generic element you can use for sharing information across the DOM tree.
    It uses monostate pattern such that any
    instance of iron-meta has access to the shared
    information.
    IronOverlayBackdropElement
    iron-overlay-backdrop is a backdrop used by Polymer.IronOverlayBehavior.
    IronPagesElement
    iron-pages is used to select one of its children to show.
    IronRequestElement
    iron-request can be used to perform XMLHttpRequests.
    IronSelectorElement
    iron-selector is an element which can be used to manage a list of elements
    that can be selected.
    IronSignalsElement
    iron-signals provides basic publish-subscribe functionality.
